Q5

Class XYZCompany

  • java.lang.Object
    • Q5.XYZCompany

  • public class XYZCompany
extends java.lang.Object
    Company contains their employees' data in txt file. you can calculate the number of employees who are below 50 year old.
    Version:
    22.2.26
    Author:
    SaGaR VaRiyA
